title: Dear US, please act timely otherwise you will loss

replies.msg:
We cannot hold long
Ccp’s infiltrates from every single aspect
We can be the striker of your total war with ccp but please back us up
One whole generation have been arrested and I guarantee you will loss your war if there are only mainlander left in HK (please remember 150+ ccp spy infiltrate to hk daily)

I agree with the statement above.
Just to send few battleships to give pressure to them is ok.

In fact HK's already on war, and probably is the mainland's will.
and avoiding other countries to do it by lies to deny it's a war.
*They are trying to deny and cover they are violating international law.
It's a way to make them understand they r not qualify to the world, as an armed force, and the hkpopo. Tho its painful, but take a lesson. (but I hope ccp down.)
it's a most effective way to stop their brutal attacks, implanting the SJ policy to HK, and reorder the legal system. Especially to someone who wanted to make HK into a battlefield.
OFC... we also had to take care of the SJ situation too, as a part of the human race.
